metadata.title: MITALOO Sticky Push Up Adhesive Invisible Backless Bra Magic Nipple Covers Strapless Bra
features: Breathable & Suitable Material:This silicone bra is made up with great material, 95% Polyester and 5% Spandex. This invisible push up bra is lightweight, breathable and supportive. It always stays in place. The bra is easy to take off and put on.

THE LATEST PETALS PASTIE：The strapless silicone bra helps to push up your chest and keep your chest in a good position to prevent sagging. Just need a little pull,it'll give you a full and sexy cleavage . Drawstring closure design makes your breasts look more full, more cleavage.

Cute Butterfly & Deep V Shape Bra ：Our adhesive bra creates a busty Charming Deep V Shape Breast .It brings a sexy gather effect, the center clasp allows for adjustable cleavage enhancement while creating best breast shape, making the breast curve more beautiful.

Two Colors Available:Our adhesive bra provides two colors:Black Backless Bra(suits for dark clothes) and beige backless bra(suits for light colored clothes)you can match clothes better according to your needs.The bra is suitable for backless,strapless evening dress, wedding,party dress and so on to make you to be the absolute focus.

Reusable With Care:Before using, wipe the breasts with warm towel; Dry in the shade, not expose to the Sun. Exposure may reduce the stickiness of silicone; Sweat and high temperature may affect the stickiness of silica gel. Simply hand wash with running water after each use and air dry it.【The material at the front of the cups may be puckered in transit.don`t worry .just stay within 2-3days ,they will be okay】
description: MITALOO Sticky Push Up Adhesive Invisible Backless Bra Reusable Silicone Drawstring Magic Bra Lift Nipple Covers Strapless Bra for Women FEATURES 1.This adhesive bra in pure material,but comfort. Reusable Bra Provides a Push up Effect:It brings curve with a breast shape. 2.This strapless bra is to be adhesive directly to the skin, leaving no trace on skin after removing, it stays freely with a soft feeling and also strong enough to stay in place. 3.Too much sweat will affect the effectiveness of the adhesive, so the sticky bra is not suitable for using in high temperature outdoors or doing exercise. 4.Wear clean before chest and alar skin and make sure you don't use any body oil or lotion before sticking this to your skin or ir won't stick at all. 5.Special design with drawstring, invisible bra, adhesive bra, sticky bra, strapless bra, backless bra, perfect for wedding dress or any dresses for Formal occasions. PRODUCT INFORMATION Material :95% Polyester and 5% Spandex Package: 1 piece Adhesive Bra Size:B Cup 32/70A 34/75A 32/70A 32/70B 36/80A 34/75B 38/85A C Cup 32/70C 32/70D 34/75C 36/80B 38/85B 36/70C D Cup 32/70D 36/80D 38/85C 38/85D 32/70E Color:Beige,Black Reusable:Yes Washable:Yes CLEAN & WEAR TIPS Clean your chest and Remove the protective film from the bra before wearing. Hand wash only, Simply wash with warm water and mild soap then air dry. When the silicone bra is dry, the adhesive regenerates itself for next use. Do not recommend for hot temperatures, as sweat may make it slip down.
